 2006-01622006-03-30,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActAn Act to authorize the Minister of Finance to make certain payments [S.C.2005, c.36]
PrecisOrder specifiying how some of the 2005-2006 BUDGET SURPLUS shall be allocated to certain trust funds for post-secondary education, public transit infrastructure, affordable housing, off-reserve Aboriginal housing and for affordable housing in the three northern territories.
